titlestmt.titleproper: Jeffrey Ballinger Research Files on the Nike Anti-Sweatshop Campaign WAG.115

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-06-15T10:49-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Jeffrey Ballinger Research Files on the Nike Anti-Sweatshop Campaign

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.physloc: Materials stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please contact tamiment.wagner@library.nyu.edu at least two business days prior to research visit.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Jeffrey Ballinger, the creator of this collection, were transferred to New York University in 2001. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Tamiment Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Material relating to the Nike campaign, Indonesia.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Jeffrey Ballinger sent a gift of description of his papers in 2001. The accession number associated with this gift is 2001.194.
